mapper.insert: insert into family (ID, MEMBER_ID, NAME, RELATION, WORK_UNIT, OFFICE, ADDRESS, SORT, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{office,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE})

mapper.update:
update family
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELATION = #{relation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},

UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
